idea-plugin.name: EasyMap 2
idea-plugin.description: A simple, logical and easy-to-remember keymap for JetBrains IDEs on macOS. Good for IntelliJ or PyCharm beginners or those who have difficulty remembering the default IntelliJ key-bindings. Features are organized into groups. Each group has a memorable prefix key: Tool Windows (⌘T), Editing (⌘E), Debugging (⌘D), Git (⌘G) and Java (⌘J).
